author: Esmay Rosalyne
description:
It’s almost expected to start a review of an anthology with the caveat that ‘it’s a mixed bag of hits and misses’, but sentiment definitely doesn’t hold true for ETHOS. Conjured up by The Arcanist Guild, a group of six wickedly talented indie authors known for their emotionally charged, morally complex, and thematically rich dark […]

The post REVIEW: ETHOS: A Dark Fantasy Anthology by The Arcanist Guild appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: ETHOS: A Dark Fantasy Anthology by The Arcanist Guild
